title: Browns Draft Breakdown with Dustin Fox (Football 04/24)
description:
Dustin Fox of 92.3 in Cleveland and The Athletic Cleveland joins Will Brinson to break down what the Browns should do with their first two picks, which quarterback he thinks the Browns should draft, what rumors about the Browns to believe, how he thinks Hue Jackson will handle the team in 2018, whether John Dorsey is doing a good job, if Sashi Brown deserves credit for the Browns situation, whether David Njoku can breakout and what he thinks of the Jarvis Landry contract.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy

itunes:author: CBS Sports, Football, NFL, NFL Picks, NFL Betting, 2022 NFL, NFL Predictions, NFL Recap
itunes:subtitle: Dustin Fox joins Will Brinson to discuss the Cleveland Browns' draft plans, how John Dorsey is doing early into his new job, and whether the Jarvis Landry contract was worth it or not.
